anyOf.description: A label to show the caption or title for the section header.
An icon which can communicate the action that it is going to initiate. Users can click on the icon to begin a process or workflow, or to trigger an action.
A button communicates the action that it is going to initiate. Users can click a button to begin a process or workflow, or to trigger an action.
